title: H&N Favorite: Music Flows From Run River North
teaser: We revisit our conversation with the Los Angeles-based band Run River North which is on its U.S. tour.
contentencoded:
Run River North, the Los Angeles-based group of young Korean-American indie-folk-rock musicians, is touring the country with its new music. The band’s tour includes a stop in Boston on October 16.

The bandÂ performed at the South By Southwest festival this year and their song “Growing Up” will be used in the Ron Howard produced film, “The Good Lie,” which is out today. We listen back to a conversation with members of the band from 2013.

  • Tour Dates

Guests

  • Daniel Chae, violinist and guitarist for Run River North.
  • John Chong, drummer for Run River North.
  • Joe Chun, bassist for Run River North.
  • Alex Hwang, singer/songwriter for Run River North.
  • Sally Kang, keyboardist for Run River North.
  • Jennifer Rimm, violinist for Run River North.
